ygData.subject: Time to reunite.
ygData.msgSnippet: * Shadow Cat trudged through the trees, holding both kittens in he arms. She almost was swept off her feet when a large branch snapped into view. She jumped

From: "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@...>


* Shadow Cat trudged through the trees, holding both kittens in he arms. She 
almost was swept off her feet when a large branch snapped into view. She 
jumped back, suprised.*

" Wass that?"

* A large, furry head popped out from the trees, jittering at her in anger. 
It large, furry snout working at break-neck speed. It shook a large paw at 
her and dissapeared into the dence foliage. Snow Tech walked up behind her*

" What was that? It looked like a giant chipmunk!"

* Shadow Cat nodded*

" I know, what a strange world this is!!!"

*They walked further into the forest, but stopped when they heard a 
commotion at the edge, or at least near, of the forest. They strained they 
ears forward, hoping to hear what it was before approaching.*

" It might be a pred" Shadow Cat whispered to Snow Tech. " Let me go ahead 
and see first, no need to take unessary chances with the kittens."

* She handed him the two kittens, who by now were all played out and fast 
asleep. She crouched low, consentrating on the shadows and making herself 
seem invisble by manipulating the robotic eye to see through her, or making 
them see that she was just a shadow. She slunk forward and into a battle 
field, careful to keep low to the ground. As she reached a hill, she spyed 
Iron Raptor and prowl, seemingly exhasted by fighting. Around them were 
several new bots. She frowned. She couldn't tell what they were. But she 
wouldn't confront them, just in case they decided to hurt Iron Raptor or 
Prowl. She slunk a little ways below the hill. She needed to think on what 
to do. She wouldn't call Snow Tech, because he had to look after the 
Kittens, and she didn't want to put them at risk. She frowned. The best 
approach would have to be a direct, friendly one. She stuck out her tounge. 
Not her best subject, but she'd do it anyway. She knew I.R. must be weak, 
and she didn't wnt to leave her with strangers. So, she took a deep breath 
and stood up tall and walked over the hill, looking at them all. She stopped 
and placed her hands on her hips, cocking an eyebrow at Iron Raptor*

" Having fun? Why wasn't I invited?"
